title: Entrekin
description: "This is the writing of bestsellers. Entrekin is a stellar collection of work by a writer of promise." --the PODler"Lots of heart and character. It's well polished. It is good writing. And it deserves to be read." --LL Book Review------"I think of her every time I get water from a refrigerator with an automatic filter."Poe's fictional detective investigates the death of his creator, and Jesus of Nazareth faces temptation in the desert. A man gains the ability to read his girlfriend's mind after they sleep together. Poetry about Wonderland and schizophrenia. Stories about oceans and deserts and dreamt-of towers in dreamt-of lands. Essays about September 11th, sperm donation, dancing, and getting rejected but remaining deluded about the future
author: Will Entrekin
